videos.title: head to knee
videos.description: Seated forward bend, stretches legs, spine, hips, promotes flexibility, relaxation, and mental calmness.

videos.title: deep breathing
videos.description: Deep Breathing Meditation: Focus on breath, inhale deeply, exhale slowly, promotes relaxation, clarity, and mindfulness.

videos.title: downward facing
videos.description: Inverted V-shaped pose, strengthens upper body, stretches hamstrings, calves, and spine.

videos.title: arms to heaven
videos.description: Arms gracefully raised, legs and arms move in contrasting directions with fluidity.

videos.title: eight angle
videos.description: Arm balances, legs crossed, core engaged, twists, builds strength and balance. Enhances body awareness and coordination.

videos.title: kapotasana
videos.description: Hips square, one leg forward, other leg extended back, deep hip opening stretch. Calms the mind and reduces stress and anxiety.

videos.title: foot to knee
videos.description: Arms reach overhead, fold forward, stretches hamstrings, lengthens spine, promotes relaxation.

videos.title: mountain toe
videos.description: Sitting pose, legs extended, reach for toes, stretches hamstrings, toes, and calves. Focusing on the breath and body during the pose enhances mindfulness and body awareness.

videos.title: sirsasana
videos.description: Inverted pose, balancing on the head, improves circulation, builds strength, and enhances focus and mental clarity.

videos.title: crane
videos.description: Arm balance, palms support body, strengthens arms and core, improves focus and balance.

videos.title: forward stretch
videos.description: Standing balance pose, one leg lifted, torso parallel to the ground, strengthens legs and core, improves balance and stability.

videos.title: warrior 1
videos.description: Standing pose, front knee bent, back leg extended, arms lifted, strengthens legs and core, improves posture.

videos.title: waving
videos.description: Dynamic movement, flowing spine from flexion to extension, improves spinal mobility and flexibility.
